skills.name: Fruit of Knowledge
skills.description: [SP: 6][CD: 18s] Fires a Grav Bomb at target lasting 7s and dealing 600% ATK of Physical DMG. The damage is boosted by 150% against shield. While Grav Bomb exists, [Grav Lock] is inflicted on the target if their shield breaks, disabling them and freezing shield regen for 3s. Grav Bomb explodes in 3s dealing 500% ATK of AOE Physical DMG. The generation of Grav Lock and explosion of Grav Bomb both grant 12.0% bonus team Physical DMG for 9s (can be refreshed but not stacked). Grav Bomb instantly explodes if hitting enemies with no or broken shield.

skills.name: Original Sin
skills.description: The generation of Grav Lock and explosion of Grav Bomb both impair enemies in the area, lowering their DEF by 65% for 9s (can be refreshed but not stacked).

skills.name: Key of Devouring
skills.description: In co-op raids, character gains 40.0% Crit DMG and 5.0% Crit Rate.
